flawed_nl_solution:
Toby has 60 friends because 33 / 0.55 = <<33/0.55=60>>60
54% of his friends are girls because 100 - 55 = <<100-55=54>>54
He has 27 friends who are girls because 60 x 0.45 = <<27=27>>27
#### 26.999999999999996

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
